syntaxhighlighter.brush
Class Brush

java.lang.Object
  syntaxhighlighter.brush.Brush
Direct Known Subclasses:
BrushAppleScript, BrushAS3, BrushBash, BrushColdFusion, BrushCpp, BrushCSharp, BrushCss, BrushDelphi, BrushDiff, BrushErlang, BrushGroovy, BrushJava, BrushJavaFX, BrushJScript, BrushPerl, BrushPhp, BrushPlain, BrushPowerShell, BrushPython, BrushRuby, BrushSass, BrushScala, BrushSql, BrushVb, BrushXml
public class Brush
extends java.lang.Object

Brush for syntax highlighter. In syntax highlighter, every supported programming language has its own brush. Brush contain a set of rules, the highlighter/parser will use these rules to determine the structure of the code and apply different color to different group of component.

Author:
Chan Wai Shing

regExpRuleList

protected java.util.List<RegExpRule> regExpRuleList
Regular expression rules list. It will be executed in sequence.

commonFileExtensionList

protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> commonFileExtensionList
The list of common file extension for this language. It is no use so far, just for reference.

htmlScriptRegExp

protected HTMLScriptRegExp htmlScriptRegExp
HTML script RegExp, null means no HTML script RegExp for this brush. If this language will not be implanted into HTML, leave it null.
